channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: The Oklahoma City bombing was 30 years ago. Some survivors worry America didn’t learn the lesson
item.description: Thirty years after a truck bomb detonated outside a federal building in the nation’s heartland, deep scars still remain from the deadliest homegrown attack on U.S. soil.

item.title: AP Was There: A truck bomb rips through a federal building in Oklahoma City in 1995
In their words: What judges and Trump’s government say about Abrego Garcia’s mistaken deportation
